SELECT ROWNUM as notiCd1 , A.TITLE as title , A.NOTICE_CD as notiCd2 , A.NAME as adminName , A.INS_DATE as insDate , A.VIEWS as views FROM ( SELECT N.TITLE , N.NOTICE_CD , AI.NAME , N.INS_DATE , N.VIEWS FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_ADMIN_INFO AI ON N.ADMIN_CD = AI.ADMIN_CD ORDER BY INS_DATE )A ORDER BY notiCd1 DESC

SELECT N.TITLE as title , N.NOTICE_CD as notiCd2 , AI.ADMIN_CD as adminCd , AI.NAME as adminName , TO_CHAR(N.INS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as insDate , N.VIEWS as views , N.CONTENT as content , NF.NOTICE_FILE as fileName FROM TBL_NOTICE N JOIN TBL_ADMIN_INFO AI ON N.ADMIN_CD = AI.ADMIN_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_NOTICE_FILE NF ON N.NOTICE_CD = NF.NOTICE_CD WHERE N.NOTICE_CD = #{notiCd2 }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(NOTICE_CD, TITLE, CONTENT, ADMIN_CD) VALUES('NOTI'||SEQ_NOTI.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{adminCd})
mapper.select: SELECT UD.USER_CD as code , UD.ID as id , UD.NAME as name , UD.TEL as tel , UD.EMAIL as email FROM TBL_OWN O JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON O.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_BYE UB ON O.USER_CD = UB.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_STOP US ON O.USER_CD = US.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_BLK B ON O.USER_CD = B.USER_CD WHERE UB.USER_BYE_CD IS NULL AND US.USER_STOP_CD IS NULL AND B.BLK_CD IS NULL

SELECT UD.USER_CD as code , UD.USER_TYPE_CD as userTypeCd , UD.NAME as name , TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as birthday , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY')) + 1 as age , GT.TYPE as gender , UD.ID as id , O.NICKNAME as nickName , FUNC_OWN_AVG(O.OWN_CD) as rate , FUNC_OWN_GRADE(O.OWN_CD) as grade , FUNC_OWN_POINT(O.OWN_CD) as point , UD.TEL as tel , UD.EMAIL as email , ASD.ITEM || ' ' || ASGG.ITEM || ' ' || ADEM.ITEM as addr3 , UD.ADDR_DETAIL as addrDetail , BI.ITEM as bank , UD.ACC_NUM as accNum FROM TBL_OWN O JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON O.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD JOIN TBL_GENDER_TYPE GT ON UD.GENDER_TYPE_CD = GT.GENDER_TYPE_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_D_E_M ADEM ON UD.ADDR_D_E_M_CD = ADEM.ADDR_D_E_M_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_G_G ASGG ON ADEM.ADDR_S_G_G_CD = ASGG.ADDR_S_G_G_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_D ASD ON ASGG.ADDR_S_D_CD = ASD.ADDR_S_D_CD JOIN TBL_BANK_ITEM BI ON UD.BANK_ITEM_CD = BI.BANK_ITEM_CD WHERE UD.USER_CD = #{code}

SELECT UD.ID as id , UD.NAME as name FROM TBL_SHARE_PET SP JOIN TBL_PET P ON SP.PET_CD = P.PET_CD JOIN TBL_OWN O ON SP.OWN_CD = O.OWN_CD JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON O.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD JOIN TBL_OWN O2 ON P.OWN_CD = O2.OWN_CD WHERE O2.USER_CD = #{code}

SELECT P.NAME as petName , DI.NAME as dogItem , FUNC_PET_SIZE_NAME(P.PET_CD) as petSize , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(P.BIRTH, 'YYYY')) + 1 as petAge , GT.TYPE as petGender , TO_CHAR(P.NEUTRAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as neutralDate FROM VIEW_ALL_PET V JOIN TBL_OWN O ON V.OWN_CD = O.OWN_CD JOIN TBL_PET P ON V.PET_CD = P.PET_CD JOIN TBL_DOG_ITEM DI ON P.DOG_ITEM_CD = DI.DOG_ITEM_CD JOIN TBL_GENDER_TYPE GT ON P.GENDER_TYPE_CD = GT.GENDER_TYPE_CD WHERE O.USER_CD = #{code}

SELECT UD.USER_CD as code , UD.ID as id , UD.NAME as name , UD.TEL as tel , UD.EMAIL as email FROM TBL_WOK W JOIN TBL_WOK_APPLY WA ON W.WOK_APPLY_CD = WA.WOK_APPLY_CD JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON WA.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_BYE UB ON WA.USER_CD = UB.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_STOP US ON WA.USER_CD = US.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_BLK B ON WA.USER_CD = B.USER_CD WHERE UB.USER_BYE_CD IS NULL AND US.USER_STOP_CD IS NULL AND B.BLK_CD IS NULL

SELECT UD.USER_CD as code , UD.USER_TYPE_CD as userTypeCd , UD.NAME as name , UD.ID as id , GT.TYPE as gender , TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as birthday , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY')) + 1 as age , FUNC_WOK_FDB_AVG(W.WOK_CD) as rate , UD.TEL as tel , UD.EMAIL as email , ASD.ITEM || ' ' || ASGG.ITEM || ' ' || ADEM.ITEM as addr3 , UD.ADDR_DETAIL as addrDetail , BI.ITEM as bank , UD.ACC_NUM as accNum FROM TBL_WOK W JOIN TBL_WOK_APPLY WA ON W.WOK_APPLY_CD = WA.WOK_APPLY_CD JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON WA.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD JOIN TBL_GENDER_TYPE GT ON UD.GENDER_TYPE_CD = GT.GENDER_TYPE_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_D_E_M ADEM ON UD.ADDR_D_E_M_CD = ADEM.ADDR_D_E_M_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_G_G ASGG ON ADEM.ADDR_S_G_G_CD = ASGG.ADDR_S_G_G_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_D ASD ON ASGG.ADDR_S_D_CD = ASD.ADDR_S_D_CD JOIN TBL_BANK_ITEM BI ON UD.BANK_ITEM_CD = BI.BANK_ITEM_CD WHERE UD.USER_CD = #{code}

SELECT WA.WOK_APPLY_CD as wokCd , UD.USER_CD as code , UD.ID as id , UD.NAME as name , TO_CHAR(WA.INS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as insDate FROM TBL_WOK_APPLY WA JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON WA.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_WOK W ON WA.WOK_APPLY_CD = W.WOK_APPLY_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_BYE UB ON WA.USER_CD = UB.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_BLK B ON WA.USER_CD = B.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_WOK_NO WN ON WA.WOK_APPLY_CD = WN.WOK_APPLY_CD WHERE W.WOK_CD IS NULL AND UB.USER_BYE_CD IS NULL AND B.BLK_CD IS NULL AND WN.WOK_NO_CD IS NULL

SELECT WA.WOK_APPLY_CD as wokCd , UD.NAME as name , GT.TYPE as gender , JI.ITEM as job , TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as birthday , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(UD.BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY')) + 1 as age , UD.TEL as tel , UD.EMAIL as email , ASD.ITEM || ' ' || ASGG.ITEM || ' ' || ADEM.ITEM as addr3 , UD.ADDR_DETAIL as addrDetail , WA.CAREER_NAME as careerName , WA.NURTURE_EXP as nurtureExp , WA.QUESTION1 as question1 , WA.QUESTION2 as question2 , WA.MSG as msg FROM TBL_WOK_APPLY WA JOIN TBL_USER_DATA UD ON WA.USER_CD = UD.USER_CD JOIN TBL_GENDER_TYPE GT ON UD.GENDER_TYPE_CD = GT.GENDER_TYPE_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_D_E_M ADEM ON UD.ADDR_D_E_M_CD = ADEM.ADDR_D_E_M_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_G_G ASGG ON ADEM.ADDR_S_G_G_CD = ASGG.ADDR_S_G_G_CD JOIN TBL_ADDR_S_D ASD ON ASGG.ADDR_S_D_CD = ASD.ADDR_S_D_CD JOIN TBL_JOB_ITEM JI ON WA.JOB_ITEM_CD = JI.JOB_ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_WOK W ON WA.WOK_APPLY_CD = W.WOK_APPLY_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_BYE UB ON WA.USER_CD = UB.USER_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_BLK B ON WA.USER_CD = B.USER_CD WHERE WA.WOK_APPLY_CD = #{wokCd}
